name: Are you smarter than a Zombie: Hidden Objects
name_original: Are you smarter than a Zombie: Hidden Objects
description:
Zombies have invaded the greatest stories and are destroying everything in sight! Dive into storybooks and save the things that matter most.

In this game you will:
-Help Alice get all sorts of curious objects from Wonderland before the curiouser Zombies devour everything

-Meet King Odysseus who needs to recover his treasures from Cyclop’s Cave …. before the Zombies get them!

-Encounter Mr. Gulliver who is looking for many tiny things in the land of Lilliput (but then, so are the Zombies….)

-Phileas Fogg needs stuff for his around the world in 80 days journey. So do the Zombies.

-Visit Macbeth’s castle which is soon to be overrun by Zombie’s

And much more!
